tool_description: This API removes HTML tags from text
name: HTMLRemover
title: HTMLRemover

api_list.name: https://ap-southeast-1.aws.data.mongodb-api.com/app/htmlstrip-owqjz/endpoint/htmlstrip
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to strip your text of HTML tags
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://htmlremover.p.rapidapi.com/app/htmlstrip-owqjz/endpoint/htmlstrip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "htmlremover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://htmlremover.p.rapidapi.com/app/htmlstrip-owqjz/endpoint/htmlstrip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
